replies.msg:
By 2019, marks the 70th anniversary of the University of New South Wales (UNSW). As the largest overseas alumni community of the University, the upcoming 70th Anniversary Hong Kong Alumni Dinner provides the perfect opportunity to revisit a lifetime of achievement over UNSW's history, and a future lifetime of potential, in the warm and welcoming company of fellow UNSW alumni.

The highlight of the Hong Kong Alumni calendar, the 70th Anniversary Hong Kong Alumni Dinner offers a wonderful opportunity to connect with inspiring individuals at different careers stages, from recent graduates through to well-established leaders in their field.

Enjoy a delicious buffet dinner and refresh your perspective on a range of topics as Director of AGSM & Acting Dean of UNSW Business School, Professor Nick Wailes delivers a keynote address.

An event not to be missed, this year’s Annual Dinner promises an enriching social and intellectual experience. Book and secure your seat now!

Date: 15 November 2019, Friday
Time: 7:00 - 10:30pm (Registration begins at 6:30pm)
Venue: Watermark, Central Pier No.7, Central, Hong Kong
Cost: HKD698.00 per person (VIP package and student tickets are available)
RSVP & Pay: 7 November 2019
Dress code: Smart casual
Payment Method: Payment link and Invoice will be sent to you after verification and registration. (Paypal, VISA, Master, American Express, FPS and HSBC PayMe are available)

Link: https://www.eventbrite.hk/e/unsw-70th-anniversary-hong-kong-alumni-dinner-15-november-2019-tickets-68719765669

replies.msg:
我哋大unsw嘅校友或者學生記住嚟啦
識下啲有錢仔有錢女順便增加自己嘅人脈對將來嘅前途都有幫助
